Class ShaderController

java.lang.Object

public class ShaderController
extends java.lang.Object

ShaderController will manage our shaders.

setProgram

public boolean setProgram(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> shaders)
Currently setProgram is written like this so different shaders can be written for different graphics settings.
